mapper.select: select a.alarm_id,a.sndr_nm,a.alarm_type,a.url_addr,a.crt_dt,b.emp_id as sender_id,b.emp_name as sender_name,b.emp_id as sender_id, b.emp_profile as sender_profile from (select * from alarm where emp_id=#{empId}) a left outer join employee b on(a.sndr_nm=b.emp_id and (alarm_type=1 or alarm_type=10))--여기에 보낸주체 프로필사진이나 정보를 나타내야하는 알람타입 추가 order by a.alarm_id desc
mapper.insert:
select seq_alarm.nextval from dual
insert into alarm values( #{alarmId},#{sndrNm},#{alarmType},#{urlAddr},#{empId},sysdate )
mapper.select: select count(*) from (select room_id,last_read_msg_id from chatroomuser where emp_id=#{empId} and exit_yn='N') a join chatroom b on(a.room_id=b.room_id) join message c on (b.room_Id=c.room_id and msg_id>a.last_read_msg_id)

select msg_crt_dt from( select a.*, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY msg_crt_dt desc) AS rn from (select * from (select room_id,last_read_msg_id from chatroomuser where emp_id=#{empId} and exit_yn='N') a join chatroom b on(a.room_id=b.room_id) join message c on (b.room_Id=c.room_id and msg_id>a.last_read_msg_id) ) a ) where rn=1
